availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Shelby County, Kentucky, druggist. Kentucky native. Married to Marcella B. Maddox McDowell in Shelby County on October 4, 1855. Father of Isabella McDowell, Mary E. McDowell, James R. McDowell, and William H. McDowell. Druggist in Shelby County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Shelby County, p. 153.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Shelby County Marriages, Film #000259291.
Find A Grave, "W. A. McDowell (March 23, 1824-July 26, 1898)," Memorial #132173269, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/132173269 (accessed September 19, 2018).
